titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on sulfathiozole.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5945)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/13/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the suspension of duty on sulfathiazole.
